title: Last Week!
author: JGray
text:
Thursday's page will be the last of this chapter.

Also, yesterday was Keith's birthday! So wish him a happy one!

replies.author: Gillsing*Guest*
replies.text: I had no idea elves were allowed to say "fuck".Also, happy (belated) birthday, Keith!

replies.author: Kajun*Guest*
replies.text: Happy birthday Keith, and thanks for working hard on this great webcomic!
